entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0004.9287] Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities with a value of 2,115,442 is not equal to the combined total of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations and Net cash flows from financing activities from discontinued operations ( 2,115,442 + 33,652 ) with a value of 2,149,094.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities fact are: Period :2018-01-01 to 2018-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities : 0 Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations : 0 Decimals of Net cash flows from financing activities from discontinued operations : 0
Rule Element Id:9287 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1106838/000149315220004285/burg-20191231.xml 5164
